message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  I'm willing to pay $10,500.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $11,500. What do you think?
